LanguageData.Ammo_2Bore_FMJ.label: 2-Bore cartridge (FMJ)
LanguageData.Ammo_2Bore_FMJ.description: An extremely large caliber sporting cartridge, almost impractical for any purpose, but capable of bringing down large targets like elephants or rhinoceroses.
LanguageData.Ammo_2Bore_Incendiary.label: 2-Bore cartridge (AP-I)
LanguageData.Ammo_2Bore_Incendiary.description: An extremely large caliber sporting cartridge, almost impractical for any purpose, but capable of bringing down large targets like elephants or rhinoceroses.
